snippet: Rio de Janeiro police said on Saturday they had detained 19 people with a history of committing vandalism during protests as Brazil tries to pre-empt any potential violent demonstrations during Sunday's World Cup final....

headline.print_headline: Rio Police Detain Protesters Before World Cup Final
headline.main: Rio Police Detain Protesters Before World Cup Final

lead_paragraph: Rio de Janeiro police said on Saturday they had detained 19 people with a history of committing vandalism during protests as Brazil tries to pre-empt any potential violent demonstrations during Sunday's World Cup final.
